All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Board
Represents the board of a level.
Component
Class representing a component held by a Tile.
Connector
Represents a connector held by a Tile.
Direction
Represents a Direction to which a connector points.
Direction4
 
Direction6
 
EmptyComponent
Represents an empty component.
Geometry
Represents the shape of a level tiles.
InvalidLevelException
This exception is thrown if a level file does not have a valid format.
InvalidSizeException
This exception is thrown when an integer representing a size does not have the good format.
LampComponent
Represent a lamp component.
Level
Represents a level that can be played or edited.
Level.State
This level state.
LevelConverter
Utils class to store and retrieve a level from a file.
Main
 
SourceComponent
Represents a source (i.e a components that is always powered.
Tile
Represents a tile that is held by a board.
WifiComponent
Represents a wifi component.
